title: Chilli con carne with avocado and pasta
ingredients: ['250g (9 oz) pasta of your choice', '1 avocado - stone removed, peeled and cubed', '1 tablespoon lime juice', '1 (400g) tin beef chilli con carne or your own recipe', '3 spring onions, chopped', '2 large tomatoes, diced', '1 teaspoon minced garlic', '15g fresh coriander, chopped']
